title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS LDV Maxus T60 2.8L Turbo Diesel 4Cyl. VGT Intercooler – Fuel Manager Pre Filter Kit with Bonus WF Filter Removal Tool OS-31-FM

content.rendered:
Western Filters Fuel Manager Fuel Filter Kit with WF Filter Removal Tool suits:
LDV MAXUS T60 2.8L TD GTV 10/2017-on
Turbo Diesel 4Cyl. CRD DOHC 16V SC28R150Q5

This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre Filter to separate water and contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality.
This kit includes very detailed fitting instructions and everything you will need & even where to fit it !

Kit OS-31-FM Contents :
:: 1x Fuel Filtration Unit Fuel Manager (Filters down to 30 Microns !) :: Spare 30 Micron Filter :: Mounting Bolts, washers & nuts
:: Quality Fuel hose :: Specially Designed Filter Mounting Bracket :: Straight fittings :: Blanking Plugs
::Hose Clamps :: Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube) :: Fittings to suit :: WF Filter Removal Tool

* * Install all fittings and plugs with the thread paste * *

Download PDF Info >

Fuel Manager Fuel Separators
The world-famous Fuel Manager Filtration system was introduced in the 1990s marking a major advancement in the diesel industry. Engineered to meet and exceed all engine and vehicle OE requirements, this filtration system is a unique, modular system and is highly customisable. Designed for; trucks, automobiles, heavy equipment, marine, industrial & agricultural applications.
